summary: Diff implements robust YouTube URL parsing for embed URLs, adds a reusable VideoThumbnail component with multi-step YouTube thumbnail fallbacks and a neutral placeholder, and improves the viewer modalâ€™s non-embeddable fallback with clear English messaging and an always-working external link button.

hallucinated_features.description: Enhanced/altered behavior in VideoUrlPreview to show embedded preview when possible, otherwise show thumbnail/placeholder plus an external-player hint.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on portfolio grid + viewer modal playback and thumbnail handling; explicit changes to an admin/URL preview component were not requested and could be considered scope expansion (though related).
